external_homepage: Audacity Audio Monitor (customized version of Audacity-src-1.3.13-beta).To get the HTTP/RTP streams and display in the form of waveform graph. The waveform is non-editable. It stores label tag information into the local disk. The window position, background color, foreground color are customized.
name: Audacity AudioMonitor
short_description:
Audacity Audio Monitor (customized version of Audacity).  
The existing audacity is modified to support following functionality: 
- RTSP streaming to fetch the RTP data over UDP and plot the audio stream on the graph.
- HTTP streaming to fetch the mp4 audio data using HTTP and plot the audio stream on the graph.
- Display the tag label information on the graph.Tag information will be written to local disk file.  
- Audacity Audio Monitor shall have control buttons embedded in the player. These buttons shall enable the operator to manipulate the audio streams. The following control buttons shall be provided by the Audio Monitor: Play, Pause, Stop, and Zoom in, Zoom out, Mute, Unmute, Add Label, Edit Label, and Exit Audacity.
summary: Audacity AudioMonitor (customized version of of Audacity 1.3-13-b).
